name: DramaFever
description:
Enjoy FREE unlimited instant streaming of your favorite dramas, variety shows and movies. Watch hit shows from Korea, Japan, Taiwan and Europe, all with professional subtitles.

* No membership required. Watch 100% FREE
* Watch popular dramas and variety shows like Oh My Ghostess and Running Man
* Resume watching from where you left off on your computer, TV or other supported device
* Add shows to your queue to watch later
* Premium users watch in HD and with NO ads

1 player(s)
5KB Minimum

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service).

The Video Content, the User Material, the Video Player, any other software provided by or accessed through the Service, and any other content offered on or through the Service, including graphics, photographs, text, quotations, trademarks, logos, layout, design, interface, audio and video materials and stills (all of the foregoing, collectively, the 'Site Content'), are owned solely and exclusively by DramaFever and its licensors and are protected by U.S. and foreign laws securing intellectual property rights, including those safeguarding copyrights and trademarks. Using technologies to access the Video Content from territories where DramaFever does not have rights to offer such content is strictly prohibited.
